label: Intro to Undergrad Research
description: Learn about research opportunities available to undergraduate students in the FSHN department, and find a laboratory that fits a student's interests and education goals. Guest faculty members present research opportunities in their laboratory, and then give a laboratory tour for students to learn more about the research activities there. Approved for S/U grading only. Prerequisite: For FSHN majors only.
courseSectionInformation: Approved for S/U grading only. Prerequisite: For FSHN majors only.
